text: I cant delete a context because a TTF is still opend.
creator: p.rader@gmx.net
markt@apache.org
text: There is insufficient information in this bug report for a developer to reproduce this. Please use the Apache Tomcat user's mailing list to debug this issue and if that concludes that there is a bug then please re-open this issue and add the exact steps to reproduce the issue on a clean install of the latest stable 7.0.x release.
